query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
1 S’ïo avessi le rime aspre e chiocce, 2 come si converrebbe al tristo buco 3 sovra ’l qual pontan tutte l’altre rocce,
query.error: **English:** 1 If I had harsh and hoarse rhymes, 2 as would be fitting for the dismal hole 3 over which all the other rocks jut out,
query.result: 1 Yadi mama santi padāni kaṭukāni kharāṇi ca, 2 Yathā ucitam asti duḥkhāya guhāya, 3 Yasya upari niṣpadyante sarvāḥ anyāḥ śilāḥ,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
4 io premerei di mio concetto il suco 5 più pienamente; ma perch’ io non l’abbo, 6 non sanza tema a dicer mi conduco;
query.error: **English:** 4 I would express the essence of my conception 5 more fully; but since I do not have them, 6 I am led to speak not without fear;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
7 ché non è impresa da pigliare a gabbo 8 discriver fondo a tutto l’universo, 9 né da lingua che chiami mamma o babbo.
query.error: **English:** 7 for it is no enterprise to be taken lightly 8 to describe the depths of the entire universe, 9 nor for a tongue that calls for mother or father.
query.result: 7 Yataḥ na asti kāryam yat gṛhṇīyāt parihasena, 8 Sarvasya viśvasya gambhīryam varṇayitum, 9 Na vā vācā yaḥ āha mātaram vā pitaram vā.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
10 Ma quelle donne aiutino il mio verso 11 ch’aiutaro Anfïone a chiuder Tebe, 12 sì che dal fatto il dir non sia diverso.
query.error: **English:** 10 But may those ladies help my verse 11 who helped Amphion to enclose Thebes, 12 so that the telling may not be different from the deed.
query.result: 10 Tathāpi tāḥ strīyaḥ mama ślokam sahayantām 11 Yāḥ sahayantyaḥ Amphionam Tebe puram āvaraṇe, 12 Yathā kṛtatvāt kathanaṃ na viparītam syāt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
13 Oh sovra tutte mal creata plebe 14 che stai nel loco onde parlare è duro, 15 mei foste state qui pecore o zebe!
query.error: **English:** 13 Oh, you people created worse than all evil, 14 who are in the place where speaking is difficult, 15 I wish you had been sheep or goats here!
query.result: 13 Aha sarvāṇām api durjanānāṃ prajāyāṃ śreṣṭhā 14 ye 'smin sthāne sthitāḥ kathaṃ kathayantaḥ kaṣṭaṃ prāpnuvanti, 15 mayā bhavathaḥ paśavo vā chāgāḥ atra bhaveyuḥ!

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
16 Come noi fummo giù nel pozzo scuro 17 sotto i piè del gigante assai più bassi, 18 e io mirava ancora a l’alto muro,
query.error: **English:** 16 As we were down in the dark pit, 17 much lower than the giant's feet, 18 and I was still looking at the high wall,
query.result: 16 Yathā vayam adhastād andhakūpe 'bhaviṣyāmaḥ 17 dānavendrasya pādābhyāṃ bhūyaḥ adhastāt, 18 aham api tadāpi ūrdhvaṃ prākāraṃ paśyāmi,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
19 dicere udi’mi: «Guarda come passi: 20 va sì, che tu non calchi con le piante 21 le teste de’ fratei miseri lassi».
query.error: **English:** 19 I heard someone say to me: "Watch how you step: 20 go so that you do not tread with your feet 21 on the heads of your wretched, weary brothers."
query.result: 19 śṛṇomi mama: "Paśya katham carasi: 20 gaccha tathā, yathā tava pādābhyāṃ na pīḍyante 21 duḥkhitānāṃ śramaṇānāṃ śirasī."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
22 Per ch’io mi volsi, e vidimi davante 23 e sotto i piedi un lago che per gelo 24 avea di vetro e non d’acqua sembiante.
query.error: **English:** 22 Whereupon I turned, and saw before me 23 and beneath my feet a lake that, because of the frost, 24 seemed to be of glass and not of water.
query.result: 22 Yataḥ aham āvartām, ca apaśyam agre 23 Adhaḥ ca pādābhyām hradaḥ yaḥ himakaraṇāt 24 Kākacīcchāyāṃ bibharti na jalam iva.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
25 Non fece al corso suo sì grosso velo 26 di verno la Danoia in Osterlicchi, 27 né Tanaï là sotto ’l freddo cielo,
query.error: **English:** 25 The Danube in Austria never made so thick a veil 26 of itself in winter, 27 nor the Don River there beneath the cold sky,
query.result: 25 Na cakāra sva-pravāhe tādr̥śam āvaraṇam 26 hime Danubhyo 'stirichiṣu, 27 na ca Tanais tatra śīta-nabhasi,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
28 com’ era quivi; che se Tambernicchi 29 vi fosse sù caduto, o Pietrapana, 30 non avria pur da l’orlo fatto cricchi.
query.error: **English:** 28 as was here; that if Mount Tambura or Pietrapana 29 had fallen from above, 30 it would not have made a sound from the edge.
query.result: 28 yathāstiha; yadi ca Tambaruṇiḥ 29 patitaḥ syāt tatra, vā Pietrapāṇā, 30 na khalu kanakāgra-pradeśāt kaṇaka-śabdam akārayiṣyatām.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
31 E come a gracidar si sta la rana 32 col muso fuor de l’acqua, quando sogna 33 di spigolar sovente la villana,
query.error: **English:** 31 And as a frog sits, keeping its muzzle 32 out of the water, when it dreams 33 of often gleaning in the peasant fields,
query.result: 31 Eva ca gracidāra iva tiṣṭhati raṇā 32 mukhena bahiḥ jale, yadā svapnati 33 spigolare saepe villana,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
34 livide, insin là dove appar vergogna 35 eran l’ombre dolenti ne la ghiaccia, 36 mettendo i denti in nota di cicogna.
query.error: **English:** 34 livid, up to where shame appears, 35 were the woeful shades in the ice, 36 gnashing their teeth like storks.
query.result: 34 līvidāḥ, yāvat tatra āvirbhavati lajjā 35 āsann āmbara duḥkhitāḥ śīte, 36 dantān dadatāḥ śabdena śakunasya.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
37 Ognuna in giù tenea volta la faccia; 38 da bocca il freddo, e da li occhi il cor tristo 39 tra lor testimonianza si procaccia.
query.error: **English:** 37 Each one of them kept her face turned downward; 38 from their mouths came the cold, and from their eyes the sorrowful heart 39 sought to bear witness to each other.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
40 Quand’ io m’ebbi dintorno alquanto visto, 41 volsimi a’ piedi, e vidi due sì stretti, 42 che ’l pel del capo avieno insieme misto.
query.error: **English:** 40 When I had looked around me for a while, 41 I turned to my feet and saw two so narrow, 42 that the hair of their heads was mixed together.
query.result: 40 Yada aham ātmānaṃ sarvataḥ parīkṣya, 41 Caraṇau prati apavartām, tadā aham dve caṇḍe paśyāmi, 42 Yayoḥ śirasi keśāḥ eka-sthāne miśritāḥ āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
43 «Ditemi, voi che sì strignete i petti», 44 diss’ io, «chi siete?». E quei piegaro i colli; 45 e poi ch’ebber li visi a me eretti,
query.error: **English:** 43 "Tell me, you who huddle together so tightly," 44 I said, "who are you?" And they bowed their heads; 45 and then, when they had raised their faces to me,

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
46 li occhi lor, ch’eran pria pur dentro molli, 47 gocciar su per le labbra, e ’l gelo strinse 48 le lagrime tra essi e riserrolli.
query.error: **English:** 46 their eyes, which were once soft within, 47 began to drip down over their lips, and the frost 48 congealed the tears between them and sealed them shut.
query.result: 46 teṣāṃ nayane, yāni pūrvam antar eva mṛduli āsīt, 47 adhara-upari sīdanti sma, himaḥ ca samāvartayati sma 48 aśrūṇi teṣāṃ madhye, tāni ca samāvarayati sma.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
49 Con legno legno spranga mai non cinse 50 forte così; ond’ ei come due becchi 51 cozzaro insieme, tanta ira li vinse.
query.error: **English:** 49 Wood with wood never bound together 50 so tightly; and they, like two he-goats, 51 clashed together, so much fury overcame them.
query.result: 49 Kāṣṭhena kāṣṭhaṃ samspr̥śya na kadācit 50 evaṃ dṛḍham; ataḥ tau yathā dve ajāvī 51 parasparam āhataṃ, tāvattāu krodhena abhibhūtāv abhūtām.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
52 E un ch’avea perduti ambo li orecchi 53 per la freddura, pur col viso in giùe, 54 disse: «Perché cotanto in noi ti specchi?
query.error: **English:** 52 And one who had lost both his ears 53 from the cold, with his face still downward, 54 said: "Why do you gaze so intently at us?
query.result: 52 Ekaśca yaḥ ubhau karṇau naṣṭavān āsīt 53 śītena, mukhena adhomukhena api, 54 uvāca: "Kimartham asmāsu evam avalokayase?

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
55 Se vuoi saper chi son cotesti due, 56 la valle onde Bisenzo si dichina 57 del padre loro Alberto e di lor fue.
query.error: **English:** 55 If you wish to know who these two are, 56 the valley where Bisenzio descends 57 was the birthplace of their father Alberto and of them.
query.result: 55 Yadi jñātum icchasi kausīdau, 56 yasmāt upatyakāt Bisenzoḥ avataraṇam asti, 57 tatra tasyau pitur Albertoḥ eva ca tayoh janma āsīt.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
67 E perché non mi metti in più sermoni, 68 sappi ch’i’ fu’ il Camiscion de’ Pazzi; 69 e aspetto Carlin che mi scagioni».

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
70 Poscia vid’ io mille visi cagnazzi 71 fatti per freddo; onde mi vien riprezzo, 72 e verrà sempre, de’ gelati guazzi.
query.error: **English:** 70 Then I saw a thousand snarling faces 71 made hideous by the cold, 72 and I will always shudder at the frozen pools.
query.result: 70 Tataḥ aham adṛkṣam sahasraṃ vaktrāṇi kṛpaṇāni 71 kṛtāni śītena; yataḥ me jāyate bhayaṃ, 72 ca bhavitā sadā, himapūrṇeṣu jaleṣu.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
73 E mentre ch’andavamo inver’ lo mezzo 74 al quale ogne gravezza si rauna, 75 e io tremava ne l’etterno rezzo;
query.error: **English:** 73 And while we were going toward the middle, 74 where every weight is gathered, 75 and I trembled in the eternal cold;

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
76 se voler fu o destino o fortuna, 77 non so; ma, passeggiando tra le teste, 78 forte percossi ’l piè nel viso ad una.
query.error: **English:** 76 whether it was will or destiny or fortune, 77 I do not know; but, walking among the heads, 78 I struck my foot hard against the face of one.
query.result: 76 icchā vā daivaṃ vā bhagyaṃ vā, 77 na jānāmi; api tu, mastakānāṃ madhye caran, 78 ekaṃ vadanam pādena praharaṇena pratyādakam.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
79 Piangendo mi sgridò: «Perché mi peste? 80 se tu non vieni a crescer la vendetta 81 di Montaperti, perché mi moleste?».
query.error: **English:** 79 Weeping, he cried out to me: "Why do you beat me? 80 If you do not come to increase the vengeance 81 of Montaperti, why do you torment me?"
query.result: 79 Rudan mamavadīt: "Kimartham mā vadhasi? 80 Yadi na tvam āgacchasi vardhayitum pratiśodham 81 Montaperteḥ, kimartham mā pidayasi?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
82 E io: «Maestro mio, or qui m’aspetta, 83 sì ch’io esca d’un dubbio per costui; 84 poi mi farai, quantunque vorrai, fretta».
query.error: **English:** 82 And I: "My master, now wait for me here, 83 so that I may escape from a doubt through him; 84 then I will hurry, whenever you wish."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
85 Lo duca stette, e io dissi a colui 86 che bestemmiava duramente ancora: 87 «Qual se’ tu che così rampogni altrui?».
query.error: **English:** 85 The leader stopped, and I said to him 86 who was still cursing harshly: 87 "Who are you that so revile others?"
query.result: 85 Nāyakaḥ tiṣṭhati sma, aham ca āha tad-anu 86 Yaḥ śapathaṃ dadāti duruktaṃ api, 87 "Kaḥ asi tvam yaḥ evam nindasi anyān?".

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
88 «Or tu chi se’ che vai per l’Antenora, 89 percotendo», rispuose, «altrui le gote, 90 sì che, se fossi vivo, troppo fora?».
query.error: **English:** 88 "Now who are you who go through Antenora, 89 striking others on the cheek," he replied, 90 "so that, if you were alive, it would be too much?"
query.result: 88 "Adya tvam kaḥ asi yaḥ Antenorāyaṇe gacchasi, 89 anyasya gātrāṇi tāḍayan," sa uvāca, 90 "yadyadi jīvitaḥ syāḥ, atiriktasya bhaviṣyati?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
91 «Vivo son io, e caro esser ti puote», 92 fu mia risposta, «se dimandi fama, 93 ch’io metta il nome tuo tra l’altre note».
query.error: **English:** 91 "I am alive, and it can be dear to you," 92 was my answer, "if you ask for fame, 93 that I put your name among the other notes."
query.result: 91 Jīva eva aham asmi, priyaśca te bhavitum arhati, 92 abravam aham, "yadi yācase yaśaḥ, 93 yathā aham nāma tava likhāmi anyeṣu nāmasu."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
94 Ed elli a me: «Del contrario ho io brama. 95 Lèvati quinci e non mi dar più lagna, 96 ché mal sai lusingar per questa lama!».
query.error: **English:** 94 And he to me: "I desire the opposite. 95 Get away from here and do not bother me any more, 96 for you know poorly how to flatter on this road!"
query.result: 94 Sa ca mama: "Viruddhaṃ me icchā. 95 Gaccha atra, mā ca mama āyāsam dāḥ, 96 durlabhaḥ hi tava ayam mārge prasādaḥ!"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
97 Allor lo presi per la cuticagna 98 e dissi: «El converrà che tu ti nomi, 99 o che capel qui sù non ti rimagna».
query.error: **English:** 97 Then I seized him by the scruff of the neck 98 and said: "You must tell me your name, 99 or no hair will remain on your head."
query.result: 97 Tatra tam grhītvā galaskandhe 98 Uvāca: "Tava nāma vaktavyameva, 99 Anyathā na keśāḥ śeṣāḥ śirasi te bhavisyanti."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
100 Ond’ elli a me: «Perché tu mi dischiomi, 101 né ti dirò ch’io sia, né mosterrolti, 102 se mille fiate in sul capo mi tomi».
query.error: **English:** 100 And he to me: "Why do you strip me, 101 nor will I tell you who I am, nor show myself to you, 102 even if you strike me on the head a thousand times."
query.result: 100 Atha sa mama: "Kimartham māṃ viṣaṇḍayaḥ, 101 na ca vakṣyāmi kaḥ aham asmi, na ca darśayāmi ātmānam, 102 yadi śirasy api mama sahasrakṛtvaḥ praharaṇam karoṣi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
106 quando un altro gridò: «Che hai tu, Bocca? 107 non ti basta sonar con le mascelle, 108 se tu non latri? qual diavol ti tocca?».
query.error: **English:** 106 when another one shouted: "What's wrong with you, Bocca? 107 Isn't it enough for you to make noise with your jaws, 108 without barking? What devil is bothering you?"
query.result: 106 yadā aparo 'bravīt: "Kim tvayi, Boca? 107 Na tvayi tāḍanāya hanū tad eva paryāptam, 108 yadi na tvam latrasi? Kaḥ piśācaḥ tvām spṛśati?"

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
109 «Omai», diss’ io, «non vo’ che più favelle, 110 malvagio traditor; ch’a la tua onta 111 io porterò di te vere novelle».
query.error: **English:** 109 "Oh, to you," I said, "I do not want you to speak any more, 110 wicked traitor; for to your shame 111 I will carry true news of you."
query.result: 109 "Ahaṃ tvām," iti ahaṃ, "na icchāmi yathā punaḥ kathāḥ kathayaḥ, 110 durjanaḥ drohī; yataḥ tava apamānaṃ prati 111 aham tava satyāḥ kathāḥ pravakṣyāmi."

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.

query.error: **English:** 112 "Go now," he replied, "and tell what you wish; 113 but do not be silent, if you escape from here, 114 about what made your tongue so ready just now.

query.prompt:
Please translate each line literally into English and Sanskrit.
115 El piange qui l’argento de’ Franceschi: 116 “Io vidi”, potrai dir, “quel da Duera 117 là dove i peccatori stanno freschi”.
query.error: **English:** 115 Here the silver of the French weeps: 116 “I saw,” you will be able to say, “that one from Douai 117 where the sinners stand cool.”
query.result: 115 Iha rajyataṃ rājataṃ Frāṃśānāṃ rodate: 116 “Aham apaśyam,” vaktuṃ śakṣyasi, “tad Duera-sthitaṃ 117 yatra pāpinaḥ śītalāḥ sthitāḥ.”

query.prompt:

query.result: 118 Yadi pṛcchasi “Anye ke āsan?”, 119 Asti te sārdham saḥ Beccheria-gataḥ, 120 Yasya kaṇṭhaṃ vyacchedau Florentiā.

121 Gianni de’ Soldanier credo che sia 122 più là con Ganellone e Tebaldello, 123 ch’aprì Faenza quando si dormia».

139 se quella con ch’io parlo non si secca».
